Reviews.Title: “Basic hotel, space is limited but clean and decent location”

Reviews.Content: stayed october week hotel ok ensuite ensuite little cupboard tiles cracked bathroom door actually ensuite bedroom little move windows air con hot clean attended everyday staff nice except lady rude luckily duty day didnt dealings hotel location bus train station 50 min walk san marco waterbus links scalzi bridge hotel location seeing venice

Reviews.Title: “Great location, best price!”
Reviews.Author: Nichakorn
Reviews.Content: ive searching cheap hotel venice time found hotel cheap price friend prefered budget trip walk close train station hotel left staffs friendly nice pros low price nice staffs location easy clean cons tiny elevator hard tons bags 3rd floor understand hotel breakfast anyway enjoyed stay lot

Reviews.Title: “Don't stay here if you like to wash”

Reviews.Content: doubts booking hotel ensuite bathrooms bathrooms available wrong minerva provides 1 shower 3 floors provide sink taps leak helps awake concentrates mind corridor toilet tried shower twice water cold 2pm 6pm strip washing sink water barely warm personal hygiene hotel reception staff neither helpful nor friendly location conveniently near train bus stations yourself favour stay else
